summary: I HAVE BEEN NOTIFIED DURING THE INITIAL RECALL OF THE LETHAL TAKATA AIRBAGS IN MY 2006 MUSTANG. TODAY, I HAVE BEEN CONTACTING THE DEALER IN MARGATE FLORIDA WHERE I PURCHASED THE VEHICLE. AS OF THIS DATE AFTER NUMEROUS TELEPHONE CALLS, VISITS, I AM STILL WITHOUT THE PASSENGER SIDE AIRBAG. I LEFT MESSAGES, NOT RETURN CALLS, POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE RESPONSES, ETC... I WOULD LIKE SOME ASSISTANCE IN GETTING THE PASSENGER SIDE BAG REPLACED. IT'S BEEN SEVERAL YEARS AND THE CAR IS A DAILY DRIVEN CAR BEFORE MY FAMILY EXPERIENCE THE SAD EVENTS AS OTHER FAMLLIES HAS EXPERIENC3ED.
